|eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Microchip;SST12LP14A;SST, 12LP14A, 825112;1;InGaP/GaAs;QFN-16;3 mm x 3 mm; |flags= |stock_boot=rtkload;v1.3c; |stock_os=Linux; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=default |default_ssid_regex=^default$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=1234 |oui=00:1F:1F |oui_eth=00:1F:1F |default_ch= }} [http://www.edimax.com/en/produce_detail.php?pd_id=18&pl1_id=1&pl2_id=5 Product page] "1242-00000263-01Z" is silkscreened on the board. The FCC test report lists the following as identical models.. *Edimax EW-7206APg / GAP-E06G *LevelOne WAP-0006 *Longshine LCS-WA5-40 *Hawking HWREG1 / HWBA54G *MINITAR MNWAPG *TONZE AW-6200R *PheeNet WAP-554G *JAHT WP-4001BR *Conceptronic C54APM *Intellinet 501903 *Asbis CN-WFAP *Sandberg 131-01 *2 Direct WL0027 *Planet WAP-4033 *Micronet SP918GKV5 ==Images== ====External==== File:Edimax EW-7206APg v4 overview.jpg|overview File:Edimax EW-7206APg v4 back.jpg|back File:Edimax EW-7206APg v4 bottom.jpg|bottom [[Has images::external| ]] ====Internal==== File:Edimax EW-7206APg v4 board top.jpg|board top File:Edimax EW-7206APg v4 board bot.jpg|board bottom [[Has images::internal| ]] ==Serial== ===Pinout=== ===Info derived from=== These serial logs are from the '''Intellinet''' branded unit shown above. {{SCollapse|boot log |
